summary: In 2014, Russia took over Crimea, a region in Ukraine, after the Ukrainian president was removed from power. Russian President Vladimir Putin wanted to bring Crimea back to Russia. Russian troops took control of important places in Crimea, and a vote was held to decide if Crimea should join Russia. Many countries believe this was against international rules and that Russia should not have taken over Crimea. The United Nations also said Russia's actions were wrong. Russia disagrees and says the people of Crimea wanted to join Russia.
title: Annexation of Crimea by the Russian Federation
